name: ODQuery
desc: An ODQuery object serves as a Cocoa wrapper for an Open Directory query.

items.name: init(node: ODNode!, forRecordTypes: Any!, attribute: String!, matchType: ODMatchType, queryValues: Any!, returnAttributes: Any!, maximumResults: Int)
items.desc: Creates a query object with provided parameters.

items.name: var operationQueue: OperationQueue!
items.desc: The queue on which asynchronous results are delivered to the delegate.

items.name: func schedule(in: RunLoop!, forMode: String!)
items.desc: Retrieves results from a query asynchronously by scheduling the query in a run loop.

items.name: func remove(from: RunLoop!, forMode: String!)
items.desc: Removes the query from a specified run loop.

items.name: func synchronize()
items.desc: Restarts a query, disposing of any results it has obtained.

items.name: func resultsAllowingPartial(Bool) -> [Any]
items.desc: Returns results from a query synchronously.
